uc511 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    BAS()
    Select points from a polygon using a BAS Master Sample.
    BoundingBox()
    Build a new Master Sample with a random rotation and seed.
    GetBoxIndices()
    Fast Implementation of finding x and y order numbers
    HIP()
    A title.
    HaltonFrame()
    Generate a Halton Frame.
    HaltonFrameBase()
    Generate a Halton Frame.
    PanelDesignAssignPanelids()
    Assign panel ids to the samples.
    SRS()
    Simple random sampling.
    SolveCongruence()
    Solve system of linear congruence from HIP paper to order HIP boxes.
    ValidatePanelDesign()
    Validate the panels and panel_overlap parameters.
    compareBoxesBoxInit()
    title.
    contains_feature()
    Check if the sf object contains a specified feature.
    cppBASpts()
    Generate numbers from a Halton Sequence.
    cppHaltonSeq()
    Draw Halton Sequence values for a single dimension.
    cppProductPoweredElements()
    Raise each element in a vector by a corresponding power provided in another vector, then return the product of all the results.
    cppRSHalton()
    Generate numbers from a Halton Sequence with a random start
    cppRSHalton_br()
    Generate numbers from a Halton Sequence with a random start
    cppWhere2Start()
    Internal function to find the ordering of the first box according to the random seed.
    getBB()
    Get the bounding box for other functions.
    getIndividualBoxIndices()
    Get the Halton Box Index for a point.
    getOverlappedPoints()
    Select points from a polygon using a BAS Master Sample.
    getProj()
    Define spatial objects in projection of the master sample.
    getRotation()
    Returns the radians of rotation of the bounding box.
    getSeed()
    Random seed definition for Western Canada Marine Master Sample.
    hipIndexRandomPermutation()
    A title.
    hipPartition()
    A title.
    hipX1split()
    A title.
    hipX2split()
    A title.
    is_sf_points()
    Check if an object is an sf points object.
    log_a_to_base_b()
    Compute the log of a to base b.
    makeFrame()
    Create a Halton Frame raster, defined in sf based on the bounding box master sample.
    masterSampleSelect()
    Generate sample points using BAS master sample.
    point2Frame()
    Get the Halton Boxes around a point resource ordered by BAS Master Sample.
    rot()
    Generate a rotation matrix for rotating objects later.
    rotate.bb()
    Rotate Bounding box by theta radians
    rotate.scale.coords()
    Scale and rotate points from the unit square to a defined projection.
    rotate.shp()
    Rotate a polygon around the centroid of a Master Sample bounding box.
    shape2Frame()
    Clip a Halton Frame based on the bounding box to the current shape.
    validate_parameters()
    Validate uc511 function parameters.

    Developed by Phil Davies, Blair Robertson, Paul van Dam-Bates, Oliver Gansell.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
